HotelElement.Name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Milwaukee Brookfield

Description.Text: Facilities Guest accommodation comprises 203 rooms. Services and facilities at the hotel include a restaurant, a dining area, a bar, a newspaper stand, room service, a conference room and a business centre. Wireless internet access is available to travellers in the public areas. Guests can buy souvenirs at the gift shop. There is also a garden. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the hotel. In addition, a shuttle service is offered. Rooms The establishment features rooms with air conditioning and a living room. A sofabed ensures a good night's sleep. Separate bedrooms are also available. The kitchenette is equipped with a fridge, a microwave and a tea/coffee station. Other features include internet access, a telephone and WiFi. The accommodation offers non-smoking rooms. Sports/Entertainment At the hotel, travellers can choose from a number of sports, leisure and relaxation activities available. The establishment features a pool and an indoor pool. A range of options are available, including a gym and a sauna. Meals Bed and breakfast is bookable.
